There are five steps to start using this service.

1. Installing the "Dazn chat" chrome extension
2. Setting "Dazn Chat‚Äù extension to your chrome web site.
3. Opening the Dazn Chat.

After those five steps, you can use the "Dazn Chat" extension.The function list of Dazn Chat include the following.

Enjoy Dazn Chat.
